knimeNode.name: Get SharePoint List Items (with conn)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node returns a List from your SharePoint as JSON

fullDescription.intro:
This nodes returns a list from Sharepoint using the Sharepoint rest v1 API
It requires a given authentication token (for details see GetRestAccessToken Node)
For details on the API see: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/office/developer/sharepoint-rest-reference
fullDescription.option: The name of your Sharepoint e.g. MySharePoint in https://mySharePoint.sharepoint.com/sites/MySharePoint/Shared%20Documents
The Title of the List you want to retrieve (should be unique)
Enable if you want to load all items of the list (might take long with very large lists)
Select how many items should be retrieved
Select in which order (by creation date) the items should be retrieved

ports.outPort: details of the files and folders
